scripts.test: yarn run transpile && PGDATABASE=pressminder node bin/test.js
scripts.create: yarn run transpile && claudia create --region us-east-1 --handler bin/index.handler --timeout 60 --profile lawlmart
scripts.update: yarn run transpile && claudia update --profile lawlmart --aws-client-timeout 1000000
scripts.create-api: yarn run transpile && claudia create --config api.json --region us-east-1 --name PressMinderApi --api-module bin/api --profile lawlmart
scripts.update-api: yarn run transpile && claudia update --config api.json --profile lawlmart --aws-client-timeout 1000000
